alert.note: Alert for Colquitt; Grady; Mitchell; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 12:31PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Grady, southeastern Mitchell, northern Thomas and southwestern Colquitt Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1230 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pelham, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Moultrie, Pelham, Camilla, Ochlocknee, Coolidge, Riverside, Funston, Sale City, Autreyville, Enon, Center Hill, Cotton, South Moultrie, Merrillville, Chastain, Laney, Dawesville, Moultrie Municipal A/P, Quality and Hartsfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
